scripts.prebuild: mkdir -p pkg/host_functions && cp -R ../host_functions/. pkg/host_functions/ && rm -rf pkg/host_functions/node_modules pkg/host_functions/.wrangler && sed -i '' -e "s#'../vane_lib/primitives'#'../../primitives'#g" pkg/host_functions/*.ts
scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run prebuild && bun build ./main.ts --outdir dist && bun run build:types
